channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn Live
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch and Dr. Richard Sherlock, a convert from Mormonism, discuss the ways the faith of the Latter-Day Saints church differs from the Catholic narrative of Jesus Christ. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Blessed Carlo Acutis From London To The World
channel.desc: An EWTN documentary on the London connection to Carlo Acutis, featuring his mother, Antonia, and Fr. Alexander Sherbrooke, whose dynamic parish in Soho mirrors Carlo?s intense devotion to the Blessed Sacrament. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Life On The Rock
channel.desc: Christine Wohar, the Executive Director of FrassatiUSA and author of Finding Frassati, joins Br. John to discuss Piere Giorgio Frassati?s life, spirituality, and path to Sainthood. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Father Spitzer?s Universe
channel.desc: Fr. Spitzer answers viewer questions on a wide range of subjects, including: Reason, Faith, Suffering, Virtue, and the Existence of God. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Perou : Les Huit Meres
channel.desc: Au d?but des ann?es 1980, une organisation r?volutionnaire communiste appel?e Sendero Luminoso ? Sentier lumineux ? a lanc? une op?ration terroriste brutale dans les r?gions rurales des Andes p?ruviennes, utilisant la terreur sans piti?. L'arm?e envoy?e pour combattre le groupe terroriste a ?galement fait un usage excessif de la force, d?truisant des villages et tuant de nombreux civils innocents. En 2003, ? la fin de 20 ans d'insurrection, plus de 70 000 personnes ?taient mortes ou avaient disparu. Encore aujourd'hui, les traumatismes occasionn?s par ce conflit affectent profond?ment la vie quotidienne du peuple p?ruvien. La Congr?gation des S?urs missionnaires de J?sus Verbe et Victime apporte soins et r?confort ? ces r?gions ?loign?es. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! World Over
channel.desc: Each week, Raymond Arroyo challenges viewers with important political and cultural reporting and analysis of a wide variety of topics of interest to Catholics and people of faith. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Living Divine Mercy
channel.desc: Fr. Chris Alar, M.I.C. helps viewers get a better understanding of the Divine Mercy message, and shares powerful, real life examples of people who live Divine Mercy in their every day lives. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: They Might Be Saints Blessed Solanus Casey
channel.desc: Solanus Casey was known far and wide as the miracle-working Capuchin from Detroit, and his beatification was attended by 60,000 people at Ford Field in 2017. Michael O?Neill examines his simple yet remarkable life. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Land Rosary
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch Pacwa leads the Sorrowful Mysteries of the Rosary from the actual holy sites and shrines where they took place, bringing the Gospels to life and offering a deeper understanding of the Rosary meditations. (18 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Most Precious Blood Of Jesus
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word at the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama, as they recite this beautiful prayer in honor of the Precious Blood of Jesus shed for our salvation. (12 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Called To Communion With Dr. David Anders
channel.desc: Dr. Anders answers questions about Catholic fundamentals, while also touching on religion versus relationship and the notion of a link between the Church and the U.S. Government. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Widow's Walk With Christ
channel.desc: Dr. Ronda Chervin and Anne Lassiter continue their look at widowhood from a Catholic perspective, with an engaging discussion on how to meet the difficulties of widowhood. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother talks about how we need to be poor in spirit and realize that suffering is not about pain it is an opportunity to be like Jesus. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Dr. Brian Engelland explores the goodwill fostered by a business model built on integrity, servant leadership, and virtue. Hosted by Johnnette Williams, part 4 of 5. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Hiking In Search Of Pier Giorgio Frassati
channel.desc: Accompany Colm Flynn across breathtaking Italy with a group of young men from the United States on a life-changing pilgrimage in honor of soon-to-be saint, Pier Giorgio Frassati. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn Great Britain On Location
channel.desc: James McCullough speaks to Fiorella Nash, with the Society for the Protection of Unborn Children, about her pro-life work and her book on radical feminism. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Carlow Choir Of Louisana: 'lead Kindly Light' St. Patrick's Cathedral, Dublin
channel.desc: Music from the Carlow Choir of Alexandria, Louisiana. The group performs in St. Patrick?s Cathedral in Dublin, Ireland. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Benedicta: Marian Chant From Norcia
channel.desc: Experience the daily life of the Benedictine Monks of Norcia, and watch as they record their new album, ?Benedicta,? which contains ancient, never-before recorded Marian chants. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: A Light In The Darkness Of Our Days
channel.desc: Fr. Michael van der Peet, SCJ recalls his friendship with Mother Teresa and shares his insights which include a reflection of her ?Dark Night.?. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Stations Of The Cross
channel.desc: Using St. Alphonsus Liguori's Prayers as a guide, pray the traditional Stations of the Cross aiding your meditation with live-action images from Christ's Passion. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Explore With The Miracle Hunter
channel.desc: An early apparition occurred in the year 250 in Le Puy, France. There, a convert named Villa saw a vision of the Virgin Mary and was completely cured of her serious illness. "Miracle Hunter" Michael O'Neill investigates. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Blessed Carlo Acutis From London To The World
channel.desc: An EWTN documentary on the London connection to Carlo Acutis, featuring his mother, Antonia, and Fr. Alexander Sherbrooke, whose dynamic parish in Soho mirrors Carlo?s intense devotion to the Blessed Sacrament. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Franciscan First Friday Holy Hour
channel.desc: Beautiful hymns and a Consecration to the Sacred Heart of Jesus make this Franciscan First Friday Holy Hour a wonderful opportunity to grow in your own personal devotion to our Lord. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Rosary With Mother Angelica
channel.desc: Mother Angelica and the Poor Clares of Perpetual Adoration recite the Sorrowful Mysteries of the Rosary from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Live Adoration From Ewtn Chapel
channel.desc: From Our Lady of the Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Scripture And Tradition With Fr. Mitch Pacwa
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch studies the prophetic hymn of praise in Isaiah 42, while also commenting on how God deals with idolatry and how the Lord makes His truths clear for the deaf and blind. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Where God Weeps
channel.desc: Mark Riedemann and Madam Ambassador Chiara Porro speak about the International Religious Freedom or Belief Alliance, which works to advance freedom of religion or belief worldwide. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: World Over
channel.desc: Each week, Raymond Arroyo challenges viewers with important political and cultural reporting and analysis of a wide variety of topics of interest to Catholics and people of faith. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Rosary In French
channel.desc: The Agony, Scourging, Crowning with Thorns, Carrying the Cross and Crucifixion help us to accept pain and perseverance to the very end. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Finding God In All Things: The Teaching Of Ignatius Loyola On Daily Prayer
channel.desc: Fr. Timothy M. Gallagher, OMV discusses the transformative power of prayer. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Our Father's Plan
channel.desc: Scott Hahn and Jeff Cavins examine the rebellion against King Solomon's son and how it ended with Israel divided in two. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Fields And Faith
channel.desc: Kansas Royals? Mike Sweeney shares how he?s batted for multiple major league teams in his career, and why he feels safe at ?home? in his Catholic faith. Hosted by Bob Dolan. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: World Over
channel.desc: Each week, Raymond Arroyo challenges viewers with important political and cultural reporting and analysis of a wide variety of topics of interest to Catholics and people of faith. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Hiking In Search Of Pier Giorgio Frassati
channel.desc: Accompany Colm Flynn across breathtaking Italy with a group of young men from the United States on a life-changing pilgrimage in honor of soon-to-be saint, Pier Giorgio Frassati. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: My Lourdes Faith Journey
channel.desc: Siblings, Majella and Paul, recount their first pilgrimage to Lourdes as life-changing. One that almost didn?t happen had it not been for a mother?s insistence, and obedience. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! At Home With Jim And Joy
channel.desc: Author and President of the Fatima Family Apostolate, returns to share more about his book, ?Eucharistic: Heaven and Earth Unite,? with Jim and Joy. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reasons To Believe
channel.desc: Renowned Biblical scholar, Dr. Scott Hahn and co-host Mike Aquilina show how Jesus taught His disciples to make their faith the center of their lives. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Finding God In All Things: The Teaching Of Ignatius Loyola On Daily Prayer
channel.desc: Fr. Timothy M. Gallagher, OMV discusses the transformative power of prayer. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn News In Depth
channel.desc: EWTN?s weekly one-hour discussion of current events in the Church, politics, and culture, from a Catholic perspective. Covering the underreported stories and clarifying the Church's position on key teachings, with a focus on the laity's needs and concerns. Hosted by Catherine Hadro. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mozarabs, The Forgotten Heritage
channel.desc: Discover the true story of Christians who lived under Muslim Rule in the Iberian Peninsula from 711 to 1492 following the conquest of Toledo, known controversially as the Mozarabs. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Land Rosary
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch Pacwa leads the Joyful Mysteries of the Rosary from the actual holy sites and shrines where they took place, bringing the Gospels to life and offering a deeper understanding of the Rosary meditations. (19 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Blessed Virgin Mary
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word as they recite this beautiful prayer in honor of the Blessed Virgin Mary from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (11 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Dying Without Fear
channel.desc: In this original docudrama, a young woman receives a diagnosis of terminal cancer, which leads her to reconcile with her Catholic faith and welcome her death as she receives the Sacrament of the Anointing of the Sick. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Widow's Walk With Christ
channel.desc: Dr. Ronda Chervin and Anne Lassiter explain how widows can cope with loneliness. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Father Spitzer?s Universe
channel.desc: Fr. Spitzer answers viewer questions on a wide range of subjects, including: Reason, Faith, Suffering, Virtue, and the Existence of God. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Dr. Brian Engelland shares the six steps of making an ethical decision and how to develop integrity within a business. Hosted by Johnnette Williams, part 5 of 5. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Where God Weeps
channel.desc: Mark Riedemann and Madam Ambassador Chiara Porro speak about the International Religious Freedom or Belief Alliance, which works to advance freedom of religion or belief worldwide. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Giorgio A Modern Day Miracle Story
channel.desc: The family of a comatose young adult finds the miracle they?ve been praying for after beseeching for Blessed Pier Giorgio Frassati?s heavenly intercession. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: My Catholic Family
channel.desc: Thomas and his wife Helen teach their children Alex and Sarah about the heroic life of Blessed Pier Giorgio Frassati, the patron of youth. Animated. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The First Saturdays For Kids
channel.desc: Sister Lucia teaches four children the importance of the First Saturday devotion, and the four steps necessary for fulfilling her request in this animated special. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Marian Procession From The Holy Land
channel.desc: A monthly Rosary Procession from the site of the Annunciation and Incarnation in Nazareth. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: To The Top Pier Giorgio Frassati
channel.desc: Filmed in Italy, this docudrama chronicles the life and spirituality of Pier Giorgio Frassati, an Italian activist who put his Catholic beliefs into practice to help the poor and downtrodden in his hometown of Turin. (75 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Into The Breach: The Mission Of The Family
channel.desc: In a world that doesn?t value Christian ideals, how can we raise spiritually strong children? Discover what can instill an authentic desire in our children to deepen their Faith. (15 minutes).
